last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 16
last_episode_to_air.overview: Duty calls, forcing Ga-yeong and Patrick to briefly part ways. Da-jeong is speechless to learn of her best friend's secret relationship.

name: You Are My Spring
overview: A hotel concierge and a psychiatrist with traumatic childhoods form a heartfelt bond when they become entangled in a perplexing local murder case.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Ju Young-do flusters Kang Da-jeong with his accurate analysis of her life and his warning that she shouldn't date Chae Jun.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: A new patient jogs Young-do’s memory of a student he ran into 18 years ago. Da-jeong uncovers a message left behind by Jun.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Young-do accompanies Da-jeong on a trip to her mom's seaside shop. Ko Jin-bok is wary of the too-perfect confession and evidence in the murder case.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: The arrival of an American doctor who bears a striking resemblance to Jun startles Da-jeong and mystifies detectives.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Ian Chase visits the crime scene alone, and the police station with a lawyer. Young-do inadvertently dedicates a song to Da-jeong on air.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Snow flurries inspire Young-do and Da-jeong to enjoy an adventurous night out. Dr. Chase operates on a slain detective.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: A disoriented Dr. Chase reveals a new side of himself. Da-jeong learns of the pain in Ahn Ga-yeong’s past and in Young-do’s heart.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Da-jeong submits the story of her friendship with Young-do to his radio show. Dr. Chase learns why he was chosen for the surgical team.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Da-jeong opens up to a supportive Young-do with a story she's never told anyone else. Dr. Chase expresses interest in seeing Da-jeong again.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Unsuspecting friends crash Young-do and Da-jeong's plans for two. Dr. Chase intervenes when an unruly guest causes a scene in the hotel lobby.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: In the interrogation room, Dr. Chase asks Young-do about their shared history. A court letter brings bittersweet news to Da-jeong's family.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Detectives obtain footage of the night in question from Dr. Chase's home with surprising ease. Young-do tries to hide his hospitalization from Da-jeong.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Da-jeong and Young-do try to cope with their breakup. A USB drive reveals what happened to Choi Jeong-min on the eve of his puzzling death.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Making up for lost time, Young-do and Da-jeong delight in each other’s company. At the church, Ian Chase relates stories of the past to Da-jeong.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Mun Mi-ran apologizes to Young-do, who stops by for a stay with Da-jeong. Wanting to end it all, Ian comes clean with a revealing confession.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Duty calls, forcing Ga-yeong and Patrick to briefly part ways. Da-jeong is speechless to learn of her best friend's secret relationship.
